cartesianNetwork

Class Evolution

  • java.lang.Object
    • cartesianNetwork.Evolution

  • public class Evolution
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class that runs the (mu+lambda)-algorithm
    Author:
    Björn Piepenbrink

    • Constructor Detail

      • Evolution

        public Evolution(boolean print,
                 int maxAllowedSecondsForMutation,
                 boolean differentCalc,
                 java.util.ArrayList<InputWithClassification> inputs,
                 int nodeAmount,
                 int outputAmount,
                 int functionSet,
                 int maxModuleSize,
                 int maxAllowedModules,
                 int generationLimit,
                 double mutation_rate,
                 int levelsBack,
                 double compress_probability,
                 double modulePointMutation_probability,
                 double addInput_probability,
                 double addOutput_probability)
        The Constructor with all needed Attributes
        Parameters:
        print - If Output to the console is allowed
        maxAllowedSecondsForMutation - The maximum Time a Mutation is allowed to last (unrelevant if Mutation doesn't use Threading) - Mutation-Threading is turned off by default and can be turned on in the Evolution-Class
        differentCalc - If the Nodes of the Individual should be compared during Fitness-Evaluation (recommended to be turned off)
        inputs - The List of Inputs with which the Fitness can be calculated
        nodeAmount - The Amount of Nodes an Individual is initialized with
        outputAmount - The Number of Outputs an Individual possesses
        functionSet - The function-Set that should be used
        maxModuleSize - The max Module Size a Module can reach
        maxAllowedModules - The number of allowed Modules in the List (-1 if unlimited)
        generationLimit - The Generation-Limit where the Calculation stops
        mutation_rate - The Mutationss-Rate of the Individual
        levelsBack - The levels-back-parameter (-1 if no levelsback should be used)
        compress_probability - The Propability to create a Module
        modulePointMutation_probability - The Probability to mutate a Module
        addInput_probability - The Probability to add an Input
        addOutput_probability - The Probability to add an Output

    • Method Detail

      • EvolutionAlgorithm

        public java.util.ArrayList<Individual> EvolutionAlgorithm(int mu,
                                                          int lambda)
                                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        runs the EvolutionAlgorithm of ECGP for the constructed Net
        Parameters:
        mu - Mu for the (mu+lambda)-Strategy
        lambda - Lambda for the (mu+lambda)-Strategy
        Returns:
        The Best Mu Individuals of the run
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if something unexpected happens

      • solutionFound

        public void solutionFound()
        Use this if a perfect Individual was found so that the Evolution-Algorithm stops

      • mutateWithoutThreading

        public java.util.ArrayList<Individual> mutateWithoutThreading(java.util.ArrayList<Individual> toMutate)
                                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Mutates the given Individuals Without Threading
        Parameters:
        toMutate - The Individuals to mutate
        Returns:
        The mutated Individuals
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if something unexpected happens
